"Secret Ingredient":
"As that old saying goes#0,""Parties aren't built in a day."
And I don't have a lot of people to help me, so it's been
tough going so far... Oh, hello, again. You know that
native species they call an Agnis? I hear you can
make a stimulating seasoning from their talons.
Would you mind collecting some for me? I'd love to
use it as a secret seasoning in my main party dish!
*Target: Agnises
Drop rate varies by level (Level 1 to 20, level 21 to 40,
and level 41 and above)."
"メインディッシュの隠し味！"

"パーティは一夜にしてならず……
協力者も少なくて大変だよ、こんにちは。
アギニスって原生種がいるじゃない？
あれの鉤爪を煎じると、パーティ向けの
刺激的な調味料が作れるらしいのよ！
ぜひぜひ導入してみたいから
集めてきてもらえないかなっ？
※アギニスが対象
Lv.1～20、Lv.21～40、Lv.41～で
ドロップ率が変化"
